tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE feedback_table (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    citizen_name VARCHAR(50),
    government_official VARCHAR(50),
    feedback_message TEXT,
    date_submitted TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE citizen_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  citizen_name VARCHAR(255),
  feedback_text TEXT,
  submission_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE government_officials (
  official_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  official_name VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(100),
  email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE complaints (
  complaint_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  complainant_name VARCHAR(255),
  complaint_text TEXT,
  official_id INT,
  submission_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY (official_id) REFERENCES government_officials(official_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Citizens (
    citizen_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    phone_number TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
    feedback_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    citizen_id UUID,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP,
    feedback_content TEXT,
    resolved BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Officials (
    official_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    first_name TEXT,
    last_name TEXT,
    department TEXT,
    position TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Complaints (
    complaint_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    citizen_id UUID,
    complaint_date TIMESTAMP,
    complaint_content TEXT,
    resolved BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Complaints (
    complaint_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    citizen_id UUID REFERENCES Citizens(citizen_id),
    subject VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Resolutions (
    resolution_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    complaint_id UUID REFERENCES Complaints(complaint_id),
    resolution_text TEXT,
    resolved_by UUID REFERENCES Officials(official_id),
    resolution_date DATE
);
